snippet.title: Tobal 2 (PS1/Playstation 1997) (JP) - Epon [Playthrough/LongPlay]
snippet.description:
Platform: Playstation/PS1
Developer: DreamFactory
Publisher: Square
Year: 1997
Region: Japan (NTSC-J) 

Tobal 2 (トバル2) is a 3D fighting video game developed by DreamFactory and released by Square in Japan in 1997. It is the sequel to Tobal No. 1. The game was re-released in 2007 under Square Enix's "Legendary Hits" label.

As of 2010, the game held the record for the largest character roster in a fighting game with a grand total of 200 playable characters to choose from, as well as a greatly expanded Quest Mode compared to its predecessor.

Epon [PSX][Playthrough/LongPlay]
00:00:00 Intro
00:02:30 Title/Start
00:02:38 Character Select
00:02:50 vs Epon
00:04:14 vs Chuji Wu
00:05:36 vs Oliems
00:06:36 vs Hom
00:07:49 vs Fei Pusu
00:09:20 vs Mary Ivonskaya
00:10:28 vs ILL Goga
00:12:25 vs Doctor V
00:14:33 vs Chaco
00:16:34 vs Gren Kuts
00:17:55 vs Mufu
00:19:43 vs Nork The Mysterious
00:21:16 vs Emperor Udan
00:22:52 (Reply of Knockouts)
00:24:16 Ending 
00:25:05 Credits
00:28:35 Thank You For Watching!
